SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.gui.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.gui.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling and managing sub-controllers for the graphical game interface. It consists of all the required JavaFX elements and events when interacting with the game interface

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialises the game controller. This method hides the inventory and sell item popup, adds values to the difficulty drop town box and creates change listeners for handling round number, point number and state property changes.

    • getMapBackgroundPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getMapBackgroundPane()
      Returns:
      The pane responsible for holding the map image

    • getOverlay

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getOverlay()
      Returns:
      The pane responsible for displaying carts and watching for mouse clicks

    • getGridPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getGridPane()
      Returns:
      The grid pane responsible for displaying tower images

    • getFXWrappers

      public FXWrappers getFXWrappers()
      Returns:
      The FX wrappers instance

    • showNotification

      public void showNotification(String text, double duration)
      Shows a notification for a given duration and with the given text
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed in the notification
      duration - The duration the notification should shown

    • showSellItemPopup

      public void showSellItemPopup(Item item)
      Update the appropriate elements to allow the user to sell an item.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to sell. Set to `null` to hide this popup

    • showRandomEventDialog

      public void showRandomEventDialog(String text)
      Show the random event dialog with a given text message
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed in the dialog

    • updateButton

      public void updateButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button, Purchasable purchasable)
      Updates a shop or inventory button, given the button and purchasable object. If purchasable is null, the buttons graphic and tool tip will be removed. Otherwise, the graphic is added to the button as well as a tool tip which displays the cost price
      Parameters:
      button -
      purchasable -

    • getMapInteractionController

      public MapInteractionController getMapInteractionController()
      Retrieves the instance of the map interaction controller class
      Returns:
      The map interaction controller
